summary: ON 4/1/2003,TOOK DELIVERY OF A CHEVROLET 3500 P/UP VIN:[XXX] IT HAS A SUDDEN ACCELERATION. DEALER HAS HAD VEHICLE 3 WEEKS GM HAS NO CURE, THEY WANT TO DRIVE IT AND TRY AND CAPTURE THE DATA TO FIX IT. MY INSURANCE CO DOESN'T WANT THEM TO DRIVE IT BECAUSE OF LIABILITY. WHERE DO I GO FROM HERE.  *NLM    INFORMATION REDACTED PURSUANT TO THE FREEDOM OF INFORMATION ACT (FOIA), 5 U.S.C. 552(B)(6).  *TR
